title: Pitch Perfect
dc:creator: WBUR
description: With spring finally here and the MLB's opening day upon us, we're talkin' baseball -- the funny, the memorable, the peanuts, the hot dogs.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Pitch Perfect
itunes:summary: With spring finally here and the MLB's opening day upon us, we're talkin' baseball -- the funny, the memorable, the peanuts, the hot dogs.
itunes:subtitle: With spring finally here and the MLB's opening day upon us, we're talkin' baseball. We talk to the Redditor who calculated the odds of the infamous 2001 Randy Johnson mourning dove incident occurring, and to a young dad who received a memorable gift from the Seattle Mariners via Reddit.

media:content.media:description: Rawlings baseball glove / 0.1 unipin pen / 594 mm x 841 mm (Redditor krishartas/http://www.krishartas.com.au)
